de.must.dataobj
Class IndexItem

java.lang.Object
  de.must.dataobj.IndexItem

public class IndexItem
extends java.lang.Object

Index items to define database indices.

See Also:
Index, DataObject

Constructor Detail

IndexItem

public IndexItem(java.lang.String fieldName)
Constructs an new ascending index item with the specified field name.

Parameters:
fieldName - the name of the field to be indexed.

IndexItem

public IndexItem(java.lang.String fieldName,
                 int sortType)
Constructs an new index item with the specified field name and sort type.

Parameters:
fieldName - the name of the field to be indexed.
sortType - the sort type which may be ASCENDING or DESCENDING
